div.p: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the source of the referral.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept = < 309013001 |Referred by person (finding)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept = < 306098008 |Self-referral (procedure)

description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the source of the referral.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
